title: N-th root extraction
name: LGF_NthRoot
description:
## Short description ##

This function extracts the n-th root of a given value.
The root is defined as follows:
𝑟𝑒𝑠𝑢𝑙𝑡 = 𝑟𝑜𝑜𝑡√𝑣𝑎𝑙𝑢𝑒 = 𝑣𝑎𝑙𝑢𝑒^(1/𝑟𝑜𝑜𝑡)
STEP 7 (TIA Portal) results in the following formula:
𝑟𝑒𝑠𝑢𝑙𝑡 = 𝑣𝑎𝑙𝑢𝑒 ** (1/𝑟𝑜𝑜𝑡)

input.name: value
input.description: Value from which the root should be calculated

return_value.description: Returns the Nth root of a value
